alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 9:14AM CDT until April 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR MODERATE TO STRONG WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE COASTAL BEND AND COASTAL PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 7 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...Until 7 PM CDT tonight * WIND...Northeast 10 to 20 mph * HUMIDITY...5 to 10 percent * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Residents are urged to exercise care with respect to all outdoor activities that could inadvertently cause wildfires. Report wildfires quickly to the nearest fire department or law enforcement office.
